data.name: promoF.SelectCommand
data.value:
---DECLARE @SY nvarchar(8) ---DECLARE @GradeLevel nvarchar(4) ---DECLARE @SectionCode int
select st.StudentID, (st.LastName + ', ' + st.FirstName + ' ' + SUBSTRING(st.MiddleName,1,1) + '.') as StudentName, (st.HomeAddress + ' ' + st.HomeBarangay + ' ' + st.HomeTownCity + ' ' + st.HomeProvince) as HomeAddress, st.DOB as [BirthDate], (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) as [DOB], CASE WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 = 0 OR (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 < 0.25 THEN CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) AS VARCHAR(50)) WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 >= 0.25 AND (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 < 0.50 THEN CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) AS VARCHAR(50)) + ' 1/4' WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 >= 0.50 AND (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 < 0.75 THEN CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) AS VARCHAR(50)) + ' 1/2' WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 >= 0.75 AND (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 < 1 THEN CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) AS VARCHAR(50)) + ' 3/4' END AS [Age], sb.SubjectCode, lA.Description, CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating is NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'D' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'FS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "FinalRating", CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating is NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating >= 75 THEN 'PROM' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'RET' END as "ActionTaken",
(SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(la2.Units) is NULL THEN 0 else SUM(la2.Units) end as [Unit] FROM StudentSubjects as ss2 join Subjects su2 on ss2.SubjectCode = su2.SubjectCode join LearningAreas lA2 on lA2.LearningAreaCode = su2.LearningAreaCode WHERE SUBSTRING(ss2.StudentSY,1,8) = st.StudentId AND CAST(SUBSTRING(ss2.StudentSY,9,4) as INT) < CAST(SUBSTRING(@SY,1,4)as INT))as [PastCredit],
(SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(la3.Units)is NULL THEN 0 else SUM(la3.Units)end as [Unit] FROM StudentSubjects as ss3 join Subjects su3 on ss3.SubjectCode = su3.SubjectCode join LearningAreas lA3 on lA3.LearningAreaCode = su3.LearningAreaCode WHERE SUBSTRING(ss3.StudentSY,1,8) = st.StudentId AND CAST(SUBSTRING(ss3.StudentSY,9,4) as INT) = CAST(SUBSTRING(@SY,1,4)as INT)) AS [CurrentCredits],
st.SchoolLastAttended as [Remarks], 'YES' as [Eligibility] from Students as st join StudentEnrollments stE on ste.StudentId = st.StudentId join GradeLevels gl on gl.GradeLevel = st.GradeLevel left outer join Subjects sb on st.GradeLevel = sb.GradeLevel join LearningAreas lA on lA.LearningAreaCode = sb.LearningAreaCode left outer join StudentSubjects ss on SUBSTRING(ss.StudentSY,1,8) = st.StudentId and ss.SubjectCode = sb.SubjectCode where st.Gender = 'F' and ste.SY = @SY and ste.GradeLevel = @GradeLevel and ste.GradeSectionCode = @SectionCode order by [StudentName] asc

data.name: promoM.SelectCommand
data.value:
---DECLARE @SY nvarchar(8) ---DECLARE @GradeLevel nvarchar(4) ---DECLARE @SectionCode int
select st.StudentID, (st.LastName + ', ' + st.FirstName + ' ' + SUBSTRING(st.MiddleName,1,1) + '.') as StudentName, (st.HomeAddress + ' ' + st.HomeBarangay + ' ' + st.HomeTownCity + ' ' + st.HomeProvince) as HomeAddress, st.DOB as [BirthDate], (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) as [DOB], CASE WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 = 0 OR (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 < 0.25 THEN CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) AS VARCHAR(50)) WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 >= 0.25 AND (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 < 0.50 THEN CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) AS VARCHAR(50)) + ' 1/4' WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 >= 0.50 AND (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 < 0.75 THEN CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) AS VARCHAR(50)) + ' 1/2' WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 >= 0.75 AND (DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) % 1 < 1 THEN CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, st.DOB, GETDATE()) / 365.25) AS VARCHAR(50)) + ' 3/4' END AS [Age], sb.SubjectCode, lA.Description, CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating is NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'D' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'FS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "FinalRating", CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating is NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating >= 75 THEN 'PROM' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'RET' END as "ActionTaken",
(SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(la2.Units) is NULL THEN 0 else SUM(la2.Units) end as [Unit] FROM StudentSubjects as ss2 join Subjects su2 on ss2.SubjectCode = su2.SubjectCode join LearningAreas lA2 on lA2.LearningAreaCode = su2.LearningAreaCode WHERE SUBSTRING(ss2.StudentSY,1,8) = st.StudentId AND CAST(SUBSTRING(ss2.StudentSY,9,4) as INT) < CAST(SUBSTRING(@SY,1,4)as INT))as [PastCredit],
(SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(la3.Units)is NULL THEN 0 else SUM(la3.Units)end as [Unit] FROM StudentSubjects as ss3 join Subjects su3 on ss3.SubjectCode = su3.SubjectCode join LearningAreas lA3 on lA3.LearningAreaCode = su3.LearningAreaCode WHERE SUBSTRING(ss3.StudentSY,1,8) = st.StudentId AND CAST(SUBSTRING(ss3.StudentSY,9,4) as INT) = CAST(SUBSTRING(@SY,1,4)as INT)) AS [CurrentCredits],
st.SchoolLastAttended as [Remarks], 'YES' as [Eligibility] from Students as st join StudentEnrollments stE on ste.StudentId = st.StudentId join GradeLevels gl on gl.GradeLevel = st.GradeLevel left outer join Subjects sb on st.GradeLevel = sb.GradeLevel join LearningAreas lA on lA.LearningAreaCode = sb.LearningAreaCode left outer join StudentSubjects ss on SUBSTRING(ss.StudentSY,1,8) = st.StudentId and ss.SubjectCode = sb.SubjectCode where st.Gender = 'M' and ste.SY = @SY and ste.GradeLevel = @GradeLevel and ste.GradeSectionCode = @SectionCode order by [StudentName] asc
